splash.prominentDisclosureText:
To show your disponibility to accept mobility's solicitations and tracker them, allow {{app_name}} to access your location all of the time. 


 {{app_name}} will use the location in the background, disclosing its availability to receive mobility requests and track them.

permissionGeolocation.prominentDisclosureText:
To show your willingness to accept delivery requests and track them, allow {{app_name}} to access your location at all times.
